mapper.sql: ID, GROUP_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION,SPECIAL, STATUS, HTTP_METHOD, IS_AUTH, IS_LOGIN, AUTH_VERSION, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_METHOD, SERVICE_VERSION, TIME_OUT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CDT, UDT, VERSION,RESPONSE_HEADER
mapper.insert: insert into gateway_api (GROUP_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION,SPECIAL,STATUS, HTTP_METHOD, IS_AUTH, IS_LOGIN, AUTH_VERSION, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_METHOD, SERVICE_VERSION, TIME_OUT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CDT, UDT, VERSION,RESPONSE_HEADER ) values ( #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{special,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{httpMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAuth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeOut,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{responseHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update gateway_api
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPECIAL = #{special,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HTTP_METHOD = #{httpMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_AUTH = #{isAuth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_LOGIN = #{isLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AUTH_VERSION = #{authVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_METHOD = #{serviceMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_VERSION = #{serviceVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_OUT = #{timeOut,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UDT = now(),
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RESPONSE_HEADER = #{responseHeader,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update gateway_api set GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIAL = #{special,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HTTP_METHOD = #{httpMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_AUTH = #{isAuth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_LOGIN = #{isLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AUTH_VERSION = #{authVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_METHOD = #{serviceMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_VERSION = #{serviceVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_OUT = #{timeOut,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UDT = now(), VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESPONSE_HEADER = #{responseHeader,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM gateway_api a inner join gateway_api_group b on a.GROUP_ID = b.id

SELECT a.`ID`,a.GROUP_ID,a.`NAME`,a.`DESCRIPTION`,a.special,a.`STATUS`,a.HTTP_METHOD,a.IS_AUTH,a.IS_LOGIN,a.AUTH_VERSION,a.SERVICE_NAME, a.SERVICE_METHOD,a.SERVICE_VERSION,a.TIME_OUT,a.CREATE_BY,a.UPDATE_BY,a.`CDT`,a.`UDT`,a.`VERSION`,b.name as group_name FROM gateway_api a inner join gateway_api_group b on a.GROUP_ID = b.id
ORDER BY a.`CDT` DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}

SELECT a.`ID`,a.GROUP_ID,a.`NAME`,a.`DESCRIPTION`,a.special,a.`STATUS`,a.HTTP_METHOD,a.IS_AUTH,a.IS_LOGIN,a.AUTH_VERSION,a.SERVICE_NAME, a.SERVICE_METHOD,a.SERVICE_VERSION,a.TIME_OUT,a.CREATE_BY,a.UPDATE_BY,a.`CDT`,a.`UDT`,a.`VERSION`,b.name as group_name FROM gateway_api a inner join gateway_api_group b on a.GROUP_ID = b.id
ORDER BY a.`CDT` DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}

SELECT `ID`,GROUP_ID,`NAME`,SPECIAL,`STATUS`,HTTP_METHOD,IS_AUTH,IS_LOGIN,AUTH_VERSION,SERVICE_NAME,SERVICE_METHOD,SERVICE_VERSION,TIME_OUT,`VERSION` FROM gateway_api a
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}
